So RMD files are the coolest thing ever!

```{r}
library(reticulate)

Name <- "R: We can finish each other's?!................."
```

```{python}
Name = "Python: I saw frozen too, R.."
print(r.Name, Name)
```
```{r}
cat(c(Name, py$Name))
```
